question: Does anyone on here have Hashi's and Celiacs Disease?If so, what happened to your synthroid dose before you were diagnosed with CD?  My dosage requirment has gone from 137mcg/day to 50mcg/5x's/week.I recently have lost a lot of weight (I have gone from 164lbs to 147lbs in a few months), have muscle fatigue, heart symptoms, headaches, etc....all tests have come back normal, and up until yesterday had thought I had been test for Celiacs, but come to find out the lab never ran the test when they were suppose too.  So I just did blood work again today for CD.In addition to Hashi's, I also have Type 1 diabetes.  Thanks for your time.
title: Hashi's and Celiacs Question
